stimulusHtml: On the time interval  0 ≤ t ≤ 18 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAE@ , what is the car's absolute maximum velocity, in ft/sec, and at what time does it occur? Justify your answer.

features.html: A car is traveling on a straight road with velocity 55 ft/sec at time t = 0. For 0 ≤ t ≤ 18 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAE@ seconds, the car's acceleration a(t), in ft/sec2, is the piecewise linear function defined by the graph above
